HEADING: Comment Word Blacklist
INTRO_PARAGRAPH_1: Below are lists of comma-separated words and phrases that will be masked in comments and usernames. Be careful what words you pick here - blacklisting too common of words will drive away your community.
INTRO_PARAGRAPH_2: These are defined per-locale. A locale is a combination of a language and a geographical region.
INTRO_PARAGRAPH_3: You will see that we differentiate between words and phrases. Entries in the word list should not contain spaces or special characters. If you have a phrase that contains spaces, or periods, etc, add that to the phrase list instead.
NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: JavaScript is required for this configuration UI to function properly.
MASKED_WORDS_DESCRIPTION: Words in this list (comma separated) will be masked like ***.
MASKED_WORDS_PLACEHOLDER: Enter a comma separated list of bad words, like 'some, bad, words'.
WORDS_LENGTH_ERROR: You may enter up to 5,000 words per locale. You've entered .
MASKED_PHRASES_DESCRIPTION: Phrases in this list (comma separated) will be masked like ********.
MASKED_PHRASES_PLACEHOLDER: Enter a comma separated list of bad phrases, like 'some bad phrase, some other bad phrase'.
PHRASES_LENGTH_ERROR: You may enter up to 5,000 phrases per locale. You've entered .
